package.name: pciutils
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xJf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.xz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 2 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" make -j $jobcount DNS=yes SHARED=yes PREFIX=/usr CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else make DNS=yes SHARED=yes PREFIX=/usr fi
